description: Creates an Azure Firewall demonstration setup. Topology consists of a hub VNET with AZFW, two peered spokes with a VM in each, and a VNET simulating an on-premise location connected through S2SVPN.
summary: Creates a hub VNET with AZFW, two peered spoke VNETs with VMs and an on-prem VNET with with VM connected to the hub through S2SVPN.
